folder.name: Complete
folder.description: Scenarios that have been completely implemented. They may or may not have been released to production.

folder.name: Current
folder.description: Each subfolder of "Current" represents a story being worked on in the current sprint.

folder.name: Backlog
folder.description: Pointed stories (folders of scenarios) that have not been scheduled for implementation. The order in this folder is the priority order.

folder.name: Pointing
folder.description: Staging area for folders containing scenarios. The folders are units of pointing, corresponding with PivotalTracker stories.

folder.name: Ideas
folder.description: Conception of scenarios until they are ready to be pointed. Scenarios may be "half-baked" or unstructured, and thus may lack steps.

folder.name: Thumbnail preview for resume upload
folder.description:
Note: preview for dragged/dropped resumes - https://unitive.slack.com/files/sam/F0J98SPGA/dashboard_upload.png - https://unitive.slack.com/files/sam/F0J9987GE/dashboard_with_resumes.png
Functionality of buttons are described in story: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/111175096
Background: Given I am a job owner/editor And I am going to use unitive resume reviewer

folder.name: Resume upload
folder.description:
Maintain add resume functionality we have now, but pare down to just 'add resume' field Display sections parsed: - first name - last name - email - Experience - Skills - Education - Certifications - Referrals - Location as well as png version of pdf
Text returns as read-only Store original file Save and return to Job Dashboard Applicant is created, "unitive resume" is created

folder.name: One more path for user nudge
folder.description:
*Note: while testing user nudge, Paige determined this additional path is important for the nudge flow*
Background: Given I am user

scenario.name: Competency Focus Reminder
scenario.description:
*note: bringing back this feature from the prototype based on researchers' suggestion to disrupt interviewers' tendency to focus on culture fit and like-ability with a reminder to fact-find just on the competencies they were assigned*
https://unitive.slack.com/files/sam/F0JV7R6AD/interview_reminder_modal.png

call.actionword: I am an interviewer
I am on the prep page
I click "button"
a modal appears
it says "message"
the ... lists the competencies that interviewer was assigned in order of importance
interviewer clicks "button" to close the pop up

scenario.name: Form to upload resume for sovren-parsing

call.actionword: I click "button"
I arrive to "page" page
I see the field "field" with button "button"

scenario.name: Save uploaded resume

call.actionword: I click "button" on the resume pdf file
the window closes
a progress bar loads to 100%
I get a "message" message

scenario.name: Sovren fails

call.actionword: I am a user who is adding resumes
user drags and drops resume in field
Sovren fails
user is notified that no data was detected in the PDF
is prompted for applicant first name, last name, email
if they want to manually enter the rest of the info

scenario.name: User came back with no data

call.actionword: I am a user who is adding resumes
user drags and drops resume in field
Sovren cannot parse the resume
user is notified that no data was detected in the PDF
is prompted for applicant first name, last name, email
if they want to manually enter the rest of the info

scenario.name: PNG creation fails

call.actionword: I am a user who is adding resumes
user drags and drops resume in field
PNG creation fails
default icon of PDF displays

scenario.name: Resume's email already exists on that job

call.actionword: I am a user who is adding resumes
user clicks 'save' on parsed resume
that email already has a resume in the system on that job
user is notified that this person already has a resume for this job - do you want to use that one? or the new one?
I click 'yes, replace'
the back end keeps the original

scenario.name: Thumbnail preview of dragged/dropped resume

call.actionword: I am a job owner/editor, and I am going to use unitive resume reviewer
user drags and drops resume in field
a thumbnail preview shows of the resume in the field

scenario.name: Add applicant button

call.actionword: I am user
I have saved at least one interview question to one interviewer on 'build interview' page or at least one resume reviewed
Job has 0 applicants approved for interview
I click "button"
"p1" button is blue and not wiggle

scenario.name: It's time for me to add applicant's resumes

call.actionword: I am user
I'm on the "p1" page
Job is created
0 resumes added
0 applicants approved for interview
there are no question-interviewers saved
"p1" should be primary button and wiggle

scenario.name: It's time for me to review resumes

call.actionword: I am user
I'm on the "p1" page
job has 2 or more resumes added
0 reviewed
0 applicants approved for interview
there are no question-interviewers saved
"p1" should be primary button and wiggle

scenario.name: Schedule wiggle

call.actionword: I am user
I have added any applicants
at least one interview question is saved (regardless of whether i've added or reviewed resumes)
I click "button"
there is not already a scheduled interview
"p1" button is blue and NOT wiggle

scenario.name: Test for JIRA integration
It's time for me to review resumes copy

call.actionword: I am user
I'm on the "p1" page
job has 2 or more resumes added
0 reviewed
0 applicants approved for interview
there are no question-interviewers saved
"p1" should be primary button and wiggle

scenario.name: It should show the search bar

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should show the search bar

scenario.name: It should show the list of available reqs and the extra data with it

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should show the list of available reqs and the extra data with it

scenario.name: It should show a no-data message when there are no reqs available to the user

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should show a no-data message when there are no reqs available to the user

scenario.name: It should show a no-data message when there are no reqs after searching/filtering

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should show a no-data message when there are no reqs after searching/filtering

scenario.name: It should show the job description when clicking the "Preview" button

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should show the job description when clicking the "p1" button

scenario.name: It should create a copy of the req and job description when clicking the "Replicate" button

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should create a copy of the req and job description when clicking the "p1" button

scenario.name: It should show ten reqs and a show more link

call.actionword: I'm on the Job Copy page
it should show ten reqs and a show more link

scenario.name: It should show a job description popup

call.actionword: the setup for RequisitionCopyCtrl
it should show a job description popup

scenario.name: It should request to copy the given req and navigate to the requisition edit page

call.actionword: the setup for RequisitionCopyCtrl
it should request to copy the given req and navigate to the requisition edit page

scenario.name: It should show an error if it fails

call.actionword: the setup for RequisitionCopyCtrl
it should show an error if it fails
